khurana_Dodgeball

Class GamePanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • khurana_Dodgeball.GamePanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.FocusListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class GamePanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.lang.Runnable, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.FocusListener
    This is the beginning of a simple game. You should expand it into a dodgeball game, where the user controls an object with the mouse or keyboard, and tries to avoid the balls flying around the screen. If they get hit, it's game over. If they survive for 20 seconds (or some other fixed time), they go on to the next level.

    Should be run at around 500x300 pixels.

    Version:
    Nov. 2015
    Author:
    Christina Kemp adapted from Sam Scott
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • updateBall

        public void updateBall(FlashingBall[] ball)
        Finds out if the ball is colliding with another ball, whhether it be the ball controlled by the user If 2 balls collide, their direction changes
        Parameters:

      • collisionOccur

        public int collisionOccur(double ball1X,
                          double ball1Y,
                          double ball2Y,
                          double ball2X,
                          double ballUserX,
                          double ballUserY)
        Parameters:
        ball1X - X position of a random ball
        ball1Y - Y position of a random ball
        ball2Y - X position of another random ball
        ball2X - Y position of another random ball
        ballUserX - X position of user controlled ball
        ballUserY - Y position of user controlled ball
        Returns:
        returns 1 if 2 random balls collide, 2 or 3 depending on which random ball the ball controlled by the user is collided
